title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the NeuroLinkCommunicator project, including functional specifications, user stories, and technical constraints.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, and communication protocols.

title: Develop Brain-Computer Interface
description: Implement the brain-computer interface hardware and software components for capturing and interpreting neural signals.

title: Implement Thought-to-Text and Thought-to-Speech Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms and machine learning models for converting neural signals into text and speech output.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for interacting with the NeuroLinkCommunicator, including text and speech input/output modes.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Develop robust security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure the system's integrity.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the NeuroLinkCommunicator software.

title: Conduct Extensive Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create detailed documentation, user manuals, and training materials for the NeuroLinkCommunicator system.

title: Plan Product Launch and Marketing Strategy
description: Develop a comprehensive launch and marketing plan for the NeuroLinkCommunicator, including promotional materials and go-to-market strategies.
